name: Bias (itch)
description:
Bias is a chill, relaxed game about dice. Each turn, you select a bias (the number you want to roll), and then do a parkour challenge. If you are successful in the challenge, then you get the bias you selected. Otherwise, you get the number shown on the dice.

Made for the GMTK game jam. 

Disclaimer: My graphics are terrible, and I didn't have time to improve the parkour courses
